welcome_message_body: Welcome to Siniloan, Philippines! Known for its peaceful atmosphere and breathtaking views of nature, we hope you enjoy your stay and discover the charm of our city. Get ready to explore and experience all that Siniloan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, primarily serving international flights for Cebu Pacific and all other foreign airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves all domestic flights for small and budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and intermittent at times.
